page_content:
Marriott is committed to upholding and respecting human rights and to addressing forced 
labor risks across our value chain. We aim to Act with Integrity, as we hold ourselves to 
uncompromising ethical standards. Our initiatives to foster greater understanding and 
awareness of diverse cultures are core to our activities and business strategy. We continue 
to expand our Cultural Competence programming to better welcome guests to our hotels. In 2019, we launched a new partnership with the United States Institute of Peace (USIP) to promote peace in communities around the globe. 
WELCOME   
ALL AND  
ADVANCE 
HUMANRIGHTS
Image: Marriott associates celebrating at Stonewall 50 – WorldPride NYC 2019, where Marriott International was the proud Global Advocate of the event.
2020 SERVE 360 REPORT
